formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'Page' =-
[Synopsis] Pages phones
[Description] Page(Technology/Resource&Technology2/Resource2[|options]) Places outbound calls to the given technology / resource and dumps them into a conference bridge as muted participants. The original caller is dumped into the conference as a speaker and the room is destroyed when the original caller leaves. Valid options are: d - full duplex audio q - quiet, do not play beep to caller r - record the page into a file (see 'r' for app_meetme)

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.2 +++ in Asterisk 1.4 @@ -11,3 +11,4 @@ destroyed when the original caller leaves. Valid options are: d - full duplex audio q - quiet, do not play beep to caller + r - record the page into a file (see 'r' for app_meetme)
